elements.name: panel1
elements.title: In this exercise, you will deal with operational information and communication concepts.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Specify exactly what an operational information and communication concept is.
elements.correctAnswer: The corporate information and communication concept describes all corporate activities, i.e. marketing, customer care, media appearances and communication with employees.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are the advantages of such a concept?
elements.correctAnswer:
Written presentation of all relevant facts on corporate communication; strategic planning of all measures; holistic view of the topic of communication; all goals at a glance; elaboration of the essential points; a stable framework for practical orientation; means of explanation to third parties
overview for monitoring deadlines; costs and successes

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What parts does the company information and communication concept usually consist of?
elements.correctAnswer: Analysis: analysis of the status quo of all previous communication measures; strategy: guiding idea that defines the communication goals (messages, channels, target groups, etc.); measures: Outline of exactly how the strategy will be implemented (instruments, budget, etc.)
